// MenuActivity.kt
import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import com.bumptech.glide.Glide
import com.example.nittaro.menu.R
import java.util.ArrayList

class MenuActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    private lateinit var menuList: ArrayList<Menu>
    private lateinit var menuAdapter: MenuAdapter

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_menu)

        val addButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.add_button)
        addButton.setOnClickListener {
            val menuName = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.menu_name)
            val menuPrice = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.menu_price)
            val menuImage = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.menu_image)

            val menu = Menu(menuName.text.toString(), menuPrice.text.toString(), Glide.with(this).load(menuImage.drawable).into(menuImage))
            menuList.add(menu)
            menuAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged()
        }
    }
}

// Menu.kt
data class Menu(val name: String, val price: String, val image: ImageView)

// MenuAdapter.kt
class MenuAdapter(private val menuList: ArrayList<Menu>) : RecyclerView.Adapter<MenuAdapter.ViewHolder>() {
    override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): ViewHolder {
        return ViewHolder(LayoutInflater.from(parent.context).inflate(R.layout.menu_item, parent, false))
    }

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: ViewHolder, position: Int) {
        holder.menuName.text = menuList[position].name
        holder.menuPrice.text = menuList[position].price
        Glide.with(holder.itemView.context).load(menuList[position].image.drawable).into(holder.menuImage)
    }

    override fun getItemCount(): Int {
        return menuList.size
    }

    class ViewHolder(itemView: View) : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(itemView) {
        val menuName: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.menu_name)
        val menuPrice: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.menu_price)
        val menuImage: ImageView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.menu_image)
    }
}

// activity_menu.xml
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品名称"/>
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品价格"/>
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/menu_image"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:src="@drawable/default_image"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/add_button"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="添加菜品"/>
    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/menu_recycler"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
</LinearLayout>

// menu_item.xml
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_name"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:textSize="16sp"/>
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/menu_price"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:textSize="16sp"/>
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/menu_image"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like_button"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞"/>
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/comment_edit"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="评论"/>
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/comment_button"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="评论"/>
</LinearLayout>

// Menu.kt
data class Menu(val name: String, val price: String, val image: ImageView)

// MainActivity.kt
import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import com.example.nittaro.menu.R

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    private lateinit var menuList: ArrayList<Menu>
    private lateinit var menuAdapter: MenuAdapter

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val addButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.add_button)
        addButton.setOnClickListener {
            val menuName = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.menu_name)
            val menuPrice = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.menu_price)
            val menuImage = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.menu_image)

            val menu = Menu(menuName.text.toString(), menuPrice.text.toString(), Glide.with(this).load(menuImage.drawable).into(menuImage))
            menuList.add(menu)
            menuAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged()
        }
    }
}
